Name: get_user_basic_profile
Descr: Get a user basic profile/info.  Function requires no parameters.

Output.title: Function output schema for the get_user_basic_profile.
Output.description: Schema for interpreting output of the get_user_basic_profile function.

modified_time.description: Document modification time. Timezone is always UTC. Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS. (example: 2025-09-27T19:50:51)

primary_residence.description: User's primary residence location. Default country is USA. Can be state+county, city, zip code. (e.g. 'NC,Mecklenburg', 'Charlotte', 'LOS ANGELES CA 90001', 'ZIP Code 28105')

military_status.description: User's military (National Guard included) affiliation. None means civilian.

pension_or_retired.description: True if the user is retired and/or receiving a pension (civilian or military).

nfcc_dmp.description: True if the user is currently enrolled in an NFCC debt management program.

annual_income.description: Self-reported annual gross personal income (not household); not verified. Amount in USD.

type.description: Primary status for the userвЂ™s current work situation.

employer.description: Optional. Employer name if employed. Empty/skipped/null value means unspecified.

multi_job.description: True only if the user has multiple jobs, otherwise false.

government_benefits.description: Do you receive any government benefits? User answer (checkbox). Not verified.
